Posts.Content: Feb 18, 2009 09:30PM Dressagerider66 wrote: Hi, I start rads on Monday, Feb.23.  Six weeks of 5 days a week.  New breast cancer after double mastectomy 15 1/2 years ago!  Bummer.  I'd love to join your February group! Dressagerider66--Ingrid
Posts.Title: February 2009 rads group - all aboard!! Lories sobx

Posts.Content: Apr 7, 2009 07:45PM Dressagerider66 wrote: Hi jan, I asked my daughter, who is a Dermatologist, the skin cancer question.  She said that the radiated skin area is somewhat more likely to develop skin cancer than non-radiated skin.  She told me to keep an eye on the area and if I notice any new growths or changes to show it to her. She also said to use sun protection any time I am in the sun, especially on the radiated area (but really all over, too.)  I have not been active on this board, more of a lurker than a participant.  I've finished 32 out of 33 treatments, with my final one being tomorrow, April 8th. I start Arrimidex next, probably around the first of May. Ingrid
